articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Meets Egyptian Businessmen
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Egyptian Businessmen
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju met and had a talk with Naguib Sawiris, executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Obama Administration Assailed for Preventing Work to Unearth Remains of GIs
articles.content:
Obama Administration Assailed for Preventing Work to Unearth Remains of GIs
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army issued the following statement on Oct. 13:
					 It was the U.S. that suspended the unearthing of the remains of GIs which had been under way in the territory of the DPRK as part of the extremely hostile policy towards it, but the U.S. Department of Defense recently resorted to the base move to shift the responsibility for it on to the DPRK.
					
					 U.S. Secretary of Defense Chuck Hagel, addressing a ceremony of commemorating "the day of POWs and missing persons in action" on Sept. 19, asserted that it was the U.S. stand not to forget those missing GIs in action but find out them to the last one and make sure that they were handed to their families, while claiming that the DPRK was to blame for the failure to resume the unearthing of the remains of GIs in its territory. He talked such rubbish that this problem depends on the implementation of the resolution of the UN Security Council.
					
					 Earlier, the U.S. Department of Defense in its statement shamelessly passed the buck for the suspension of the unearthing to the DPRK by claiming as follows: Remains of 229 GIs had been unearthed in north Korea for nearly a decade since 1996 but the work of a U.S. group to unearth those remains was suspended due to the "threat to the security" of the group in 2005. It was agreed in October 2011 to resume the work, but the agreement could not be implemented because of the March 2012 ballistic missile launch and nuclear test by the DPRK and various other "threats of provocations" and "the U.S. will maintain its present stance till north Korea shows its will and action to implement the resolution of the UNSC".
					
					 According to the statement, the above-said work seemed to start and come to suspension at the request of the DPRK.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the work started at the repeated and earnest requests of the U.S. administration keen to finally settle the issue of the missing GIs killed in the Korean War and the Korean War veterans organization and the bereaved families.
					
					 In consideration of the bitter grudge of the Korean people against the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces who inflicted untold misfortune and sufferings upon them at that time and their resolution to take revenge upon them, it was something unimaginable even in a dream for the DPRK to unearth the remains of hateful aggressor troops and hand them to their families.
					
					 It was impermissible for soldiers of the hostile country to tour territories of the DPRK under the situation where the political and military tension between the DPRK and the U.S. reached an extreme phase.
					
					 But the army and people of the DPRK, prompted by their viewpoint on the future, not on the inglorious past, made a broadminded and courageous decision to make sure that the unearthing kicked off in consideration of the earnest desire of the bereaved families to see even remains of their kith and kin who died in the Korean war and get them buried in their native places and the fact that the above-said work is a humanitarian one. 
					
					 That's why the joint unearthing of the remains of GIs had been under way without any serious deviation for the nearly ten years since 1996 thanks to the unprecedented humanitarian magnanimity on the part of the DPRK even under the situation where the U.S. hostile moves against the DPRK persisted.
					
					 As regards this, once the authorities including former American presidents, bereaved families and broad public organizations expressed deep thanks to the DPRK.
					
					 The said work was suspended not due to the DPRK but due to the U.S. brigandish and unilateral attitude of terming its satellite launch for peaceful purposes "a provocation."
					
					 Consequently, remains of at least  7 800 GIs reported missing during the past Korean war now look like no better than stones as land rezoning and other gigantic nature-remaking projects made progress in the DPRK.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the words of the authorities concerned of the U.S. that it is the firm stand of the U.S. to negotiate with the DPRK so that the American soldiers who died in overseas battle sites were brought back to the last one and the humanitarian work is a matter different from politics were nothing but a lie and hypocrisy.
					
					 It is long since the organization for surveying and unearthing remains operating in the DPRK was disbanded due to the unilateral measure of suspending the work, pursuant to the U.S. administration's unreasonable hostile policy towards the DPRK
					
					 Lots of remains of GIs are left here and there uncared and carried away en masse due to construction projects of hydro-power stations, land rezoning and other gigantic nature-remaking projects, flood damage, etc. These undesirable consequences are the reality today.
					
					History will curse and condemn the American administration for its unethical acts of unreasonably scuttling even such humanitarian work as unearthing of remains of GIs agreed by the DPRK and the U.S. owing to its brigandish hostile policy towards the former.
					
					 The Obama administration should not forget even a moment the proverb saying that even a skeleton cries out of yearning for the homeland.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Railways Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Railways Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Railways led by Minister Jon Kil Su left here Monday to take part in an international seminar to be held in Sochi, Russia.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Maritime Territorial branch of the United Russia Party led by Lyudmila Talabaeva, secretary of the Regional Political Council, arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Nepalese Friendship Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Nepalese Friendship Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Baktapur City of Nepal led by Ram Mani Bhattarai, administrator of the city, arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Gift from Egyptian Businessman
articles.content:
Gift from Egyptian Businessman
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt.
					 The gift was handed to DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju by Executive Chairman Naguib Sawiris on Monday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Baktapur City, Nepal led by Ram Mani Bhattarai, administrator of the city, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday.
					 The members of the delegation laid a bunch of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Mongolian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Mongolian Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Manibadrakh Ganbold, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception Monday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there on invitation were Member of the Political Bureau and Secretary Kang Sok Ju and other officials of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Staff members of the Mongolian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The ambassador said that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries provided by the leaders of the preceding generation of Mongolia and the great leaders of the Korean people are developing in all fields.
					
					 He said he was pleased that Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is registering great achievements in the work to achieve the prosperity of the country and improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long-standing history and tradition are continuing to develop on good terms under the deep care of Marshal Kim Jong Un and President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj.
					
					 He noted that the Mongolia visit by the delegation of the WPK in September marked an important occasion in booting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and peoples.

articles.title: Swiss Guests Visit Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Swiss Guests Visit Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, and his party on a visit to the DPRK visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Monday to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 They were greeted by Jo Il Min, chief of the mission, and its staff members. 
					
					 At the talk they informed each other of their organizations' activities and exchanged views on matters of mutual concern. 
					
					 Jo Il Min expressed thanks for the Switzerland-Korea Committee for standing against the frantic war moves of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers and their anti-DPRK provocations and extending full support and solidarity to the struggle of the south Korean people for democratization of society, defence of vital rights and national reunification this year. 
					
					 He said people in every part of south Korea feel growing reverence for President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un this year marking the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 7th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					
					 Korea's reunification should be achieved by the efforts of the Korean people without interference by outside forces and the U.S. and south Korean authorities should give up the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop the reckless anti-north war exercises and provocations, the chairman noted, adding: 
					
					 All the steps and activities of the DPRK for putting an end to the history of national division and achieving national reunification are fully supported and welcomed by the international community. The Switzerland-Korea Committee extends firm solidarity to the struggle of the Korean people for the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Buddhists Mass for Reunification Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Buddhists Mass for Reunification Held
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The north-south joint Buddhists mass praying for country's reunification to mark the 7th anniversary of the restoration of Singye Temple on Mt. Kumgang took place at the temple on Monday.
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, monks of Singye Temple and believers from the north side and those of Buddhist Jogye Order from the south side.
					
					 A Buddhist ritual was followed by speeches. Then a joint prayer of the north-south Buddhists praying for the country's reunification was read out.
					
					 The speakers said that it is seven years since Singye Temple was restored to its former glory thanks to the concerted efforts of the Buddhists in the north and the south, but it is not performing its desired role as a key Buddhist temple for reunification.
					
					 They called on Buddhists in the north and south to pool their will and efforts and turn out in the practical actions for improving the north-south relations and paving the way for tour of Mt. Kumgang and thus make the temple a seminary for achieving reunification through national harmony based on Buddhism.
					
					 The joint prayer clarified the fixed will of the Buddhists of the north and south to work hard to defuse the danger of war and achieve durable peace and reunification on this land, regarding the north-south joint declaration as guidelines for national reunification and the light of Buddhism.
					
					At the end of the mass, the Buddhists in the north and the south toured the area of Kuryong Pool.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Diplomatic Corps Held
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Diplomatic Corps Held
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The sports contest of diplomatic corps in the DPRK took place at the Taesongsan Pleasure Park here on October 7-12.
					 The corps, divided into five teams, competed with each other in the events of football, volleyball and basketball.
					
					 Among the spectators were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, ambassadors of different countries, representatives of international bodies, family members of the different embassies and sports fans.
					
					 There were the finals on Oct. 12. The football title was taken by the team of embassies of European, Middle East, African and Latin American countries, the basketball title by the team of embassies of Asian countries and the volleyball title by the team of UN cooperation organizations.
					
					 That day, the participants enjoyed amusement games, divided into Hong (red) and Chong (blue) teams.
					
					 Prizes were awarded to the successful teams and individuals.
					
					 Then a national food show was given by families of the diplomatic corps.
					
					 Iranian Ambassador Mansour Chavoshi expressed thanks for having provided the sports contest of the diplomatic corps. Saying that the contest well showed the friendly relations between the DPRK and all other countries, he hoped that the friendly relationship among countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Show of Furniture and Daily Necessities Designs in DPRK
articles.content:
Show of Furniture and Daily Necessities Designs in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A show of furniture and daily necessities designs was opened at the State Industrial Art Exhibition in the DPRK on September 10, and its venue is still crowded with visitors almost every day.
					 On display there are not only designs but also products unlike the preceding shows.
					
					 According to Pak Chang Nam, a judge of the Central Industrial Art Guidance Bureau, the current show contains lots of light or unit furniture and fresh and particular necessities and their designs.
					
					 They include multi-functional furniture for children, which can be used for desk, bed and chest, and a set of fittings made of pressed and plastic materials to be furnished at apartment houses in Wisong Scientists Street. There are also designs of tableware for orphanages and home for the aged, rice-washing machine and new kinds of cosmetics.
					
					 The show lasts until early December.

articles.title: Taedonggang Beer
articles.content:
Taedonggang Beer
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Taedonggang Beer, made from locally available raw materials, has won great admiration among not only Koreans but also foreign tourists for its highly quality and taste.
					 The beer was already awarded ISO 9001 in Juche 97 (2008).
					
					 There are more than 100 beer-houses in Pyongyang always crowded with guests.
					
					 Among them is the Kyonghunggwan Beer-House located in Pothonggang District.
					
					 It serves seven kinds of Taedonggang beer with different colors and aroma, drawing many people including foreigners every day.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Raising Hot Wind of Sports throughout Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Raising Hot Wind of Sports throughout Country
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for raising a hot wind of sports throughout the country true to the Workers' Party of Korea's (WPK) idea of attaching importance to sports and thus strikingly demonstrating the spirit and stamina of Songun Korea making a leap forward towards a sports powerhouse.
					 It is the firm will of the WPK to make the hot wind of sports sweep the country and thus promote the physical strength of all the people so that they may make active contributions to labor and defence and thereby turn the country into a sports powerhouse envied by the world as early as possible, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The shining achievements made by our sportspersons at the 17th Asian Games and the 2014 provincial mass sports contest that drew keen attention of the whole country are a clear proof of the vitality of the WPK's idea of attaching importance to sports.
					
					 Sports are an important work related to the dignity and honor of the country and the nation and the victorious advance of the revolution and construction.
					
					 It is only sportspersons who fly the flags of the DPRK in foreign countries in peace time. The laudable successes made by our sportspersons at international games in recent years have aroused admiration of the world people. 
					
					 Sports play a big role in enlivening society and heightening the people's revolutionary zeal and fighting spirit.
					
					 A hot wind of sports helps the revolutionary and optimistic way of life prevail throughout the country and bring about a bigger advance in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Are Architect of Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Are Architect of Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are chiefly to blame for the leaflet scattering operation in south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 They are letting loose a string of sheer sophism that the operation was conducted by a  nongovernmental organization of its own accord and there was no legal ground to halt it, openly shielding and actively instigating human scum to scatter leaflets, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The operation is an intolerable provocation to the desire of the fellow countrymen and the trend of the times for the improvement of the north-south ties and a serious hostile act of fostering the mistrust and contradiction between the north and the south and sparking off an armed clash and even a war.
					
					 It is, at the same time, a product of the U.S. sinister plot to stem the trend of detente on the Korean Peninsula and the conspiracy of the south Korean authorities, its lackeys.
					
					 The situation proves that it is impossible to improve the north-south ties unless the challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad to block the reconciliation and unity of the Korean nation is foiled.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should see through the gravity of the situation and behave with discretion, bearing in mind our warning that the prospect for the north-south relations entirely depends on the attitude of the south side.

articles.title: KCNA Slams US Arms Buildup
articles.content:
KCNA Slams US Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. decided to make rotation deployment in south Korea within October of the Third Battalion of the U.S. 8th Mechanized Regiment stationed in Texas State, the U.S.
					 In the wake of this decision the U.S. Pacific Command blustered that the U.S. would keep the same level of commitment as now in order to deter attack on the Korean Peninsula and defuse threat from outside.
					
					 This is nothing but sophism to conceal the criminal nature of its rotation deployment and justify it.
					
					 The U.S. projected rotation deployment of its forces is a dangerous military move to ignite a war against the DPRK and keep its forces in south Korea for an indefinite period.
					
					 The U.S. has made such rotation deployment of its forces in south Korea for the last several decades while talking about someone's threat and provocation.
					
					 This year it introduced to south Korea several times a mechanized battalion equipped with M-1 A-2 tanks, combat armored cars, etc. and dozens of fighters including F-16 and F-15E. 
					
					 It is well known that it worked out a "five-point scenario" long ago to put under its control the Korean Peninsula, a key element in carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Included in it are a surgical operation plan to repeat the Gulfs war and an all-out war plan to conquer the whole of Korea through blitz warfare.
					
					 It also envisages a scenario for aggression in the event of "internal collapse" of the DPRK, a psychological warfare and a plan for dangerous nuclear attack combined with precision bombing, electronic war and network attack.
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that it is quite necessary to steadily bolster up its forces' capability for an actual war in order to carry them out.
					
					 As the U.S. made a lamentable confession right after the Korean war that it fought a wrong war with a wrong rival and in the wrong place, it is of more urgent necessity for recovering from its past defeat to increase the capability of its forces to get familiar with the local conditions.
					
					  That's why the U.S. is staging madcap war maneuvers against the DPRK every year by making rotation deployment in south Korea of its forces stationed in various parts of the world.
					
					 High-ranking officers concerned of the U.S. military are now claiming that the rotation deployment of its forces is aimed to bolster up their capability to carry out operations on the spot.
					
					 The fact that the above-said decision was made at a time when the atmosphere of dialogue is being created on the Korean Peninsula once again lays bare the true colors of the U.S. as a disturber of reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and peace.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can attain its aim for domination through the deployment of its forces.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are the elite army fully ready to beat back any aggressor forces at one blow.
					
					 The rotation deployment would put the U.S. in a more serious economic crisis and precipitate its decline and ruin.
					
					 The U.S. had better face up to the trend of the times, properly understand its unfavorable position and withdraw its forces from south Korea at an early date.

articles.title: US, Japan Censured for Their Moves to Tighten Military Alliance
articles.content:
US, Japan Censured for Their Moves to Tighten Military Alliance
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Oct. 10 to denounce the U.S. and Japan for their moves to tighten military alliance threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 A press release was read out there.
					
					 It referred to the fact that the U.S. and Japan made public an interim report for the revision of "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines" on Oct. 8.
					
					 This is absolutely intolerable as it backs Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and U.S. world hegemony, it said, and went on:
					
					 In the report Japan reiterated its support to the U.S. forces, clarifying its will to step up its military advance, unhindered, conduct military operations and battles in peace time as it will do during war time, provide weapons and ammunition to the U.S. forces and refuel U.S. fighters. 
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is the main target of the revision of the "guidelines", Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and military alliance between the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 It called for actions against them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was published in pamphlet by a Peruvian publishing house on October 6.
					 The work, published on October 3, Juche 79 (1990), expounds the idea that the leadership of the party provides a sure guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause, the issue of developing the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type, the basic ways for the party to discharge its mission and duty as a leading political organization, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organizations on Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organizations on Website
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was jointly posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on website on October 4.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates tasks to be fulfilled to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 They included seminars, photo and book exhibitions and film shows in Russia, Britain and Mongolia on October 5 and 6.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos dealing with the party-building and Songun leadership exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there also were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing the true picture of the WPK.
					
					 Film shown included Korean film "Pyongyang Today".
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation paid the highest tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to the foundation and development of the WPK.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) praised Kim Jong Il as the greatest man as he firmly defended the cause of socialism late in the last century.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain stressed that the WPK has demonstrated its invincible might as Kim Jong Il developed the party into one deeply rooted among the popular masses.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Britain.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Lauded by Chilean Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Lauded by Chilean Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) posted a special write-up on its website on Oct. 4, illustrated with the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Posted on the website was an article contributed by Eduardo Artes, first secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action), illustrated with a photo of the emblem of the WPK.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The WPK has settled all issues arising in party building and activities from the independent stand.
					
					 The Korean people have accepted the party's idea as their own and remained true to the party's leadership in one mind, trusting the party as the only guide.
					
					 There are many parties in the world but there is not such a party as the WPK which laid its solid organizational and ideological groundwork and consolidated its mass foundation and thoroughly ensured the oneness of ideology and leadership.
					
					 It is Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, the eternal leaders of Korea, who provided a key to the victory of the socialist cause, the article said, referring to the feats they performed by leading the party building.
					
					 The feats they performed in party building and activities are shining thanks to the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, the article stressed.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Marked by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign media on October 2 marked the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer said in an article titled "Serve the people!":
					
					 The WPK regards it as an iron rule to always place the wishes and interests of the people above anything else and settle all issues to serve them. It looks after their life in a responsible manner.
					
					 It is now called a mother party by the people as President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il dedicated themselves to the people all their lives, regarding it as their maxim to believe in them as in Heaven.
					
					 The Cambodian paper Pracheachon in an article titled "Great leader of mother party" said that the WPK would win victory after victory, enjoying absolute support and trust of the people as a mother party as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Guinean State TV Broadcasting Service reported as follows before showing Korean film "Pyongyang Today":
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the WPK, the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, on October 10, 1945.
					
					 Thanks to the WPK, the people's country, the socialist system centred on the popular masses, was built in Korea for the first time in the national history spanning five thousand years and the DPRK turned into an independent power in a brief span of time.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are performing miracles and innovations in defending socialism and building a thriving nation, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their leader.

articles.title: Regional Body Calls for Giving Wide Publicity to Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Feats
articles.content:
Regional Body Calls for Giving Wide Publicity to Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Feats
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea sent an appeal on Oct. 2 to Latin American regional organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and performed great feats for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence, the appeal said.
					
					 Though Kim Jong Il passed away, his feats are being given a steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un, it noted.
					
					 Thanks to him, the peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world will be firmly defended and the Songun revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will remain shining forever as the eternal treasure of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the treasured sword for winning sure victory of the global cause of independence, it said.
					
					 It called upon various countries to form committees for remembering Kim Jong Il, set December as a remembrance month and organize various events during the period on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 It said that the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea decided to hold an internet seminar of Latin American region on the great life and feats of Kim Jong Il in Lima, Peru on December 12.
					
					 It called for highly praising Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and conducting more brisk activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in the future, too.

articles.title: Iranian Paper Calls for Supporting Proposal for Founding DFRK
articles.content:
Iranian Paper Calls for Supporting Proposal for Founding DFRK
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Iran News on Oct. 6 carried an article titled "DPRK calls for realizing the proposal for reunification through federal formula" on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The paper said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal for founding the DFRK on October 10, 1980.
					
					 The proposal calls for founding a Federal Republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties.
					
					 The top leaders of the north and the south of Korea in the joint declaration published in Pyongyang on June 15, 2000 recognized that there is commonness in the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation and agreed to work for reunification in this direction.
					
					 The DPRK government has made strenuous efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations and reunify the country under the energetic guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 If the international community wants peace, security and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, it should properly understand this reality and support the DPRK's proposal for reunification through federal formula.

articles.title: US Forces in S. Korea Are Stumbling Block Lying in Way of Korea's Reunification: Russian Paper
articles.content:
US Forces in S. Korea Are Stumbling Block Lying in Way of Korea's Reunification: Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Tribuna on Oct. 8 carried an article on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, 1980, the paper said.
					
					 The proposal calls for reunifying the country through federal formula, leaving the ideologies and social systems in the north and the south as they are, it noted, adding the federal formula is a realistic proposal which helps achieve the peaceful reunification of the country in line with the aspiration and interests of all Koreans, it said, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided the north-south summit and made sure that the June 15 joint declaration was adopted and published.
					
					 The joint declaration clarifies the principles of reunification and, what is most important in it is to settle the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the nation free from outsiders' interference.
					
					 The efforts of the DPRK headed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to improve the inter-Korean relations and advance the cause of reunification have faced the opposition of south Korea and the U.S. seeking only "unification through absorption".
					
					 The DPRK will never allow "unification through absorption".
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are the main hurdles in Korea's reunification as they have nothing to do with the U.N. from long ago, in fact, though they held the flag of the "UN forces" for form's sake in the past.
					
					 As is the case with all military activities conducted by the U.S. in the region, the U.S. forces in south Korea are freezing the division of Korea and escalating artificial confrontation.
					
					 The U.S. is not willing to give up south Korea.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion de representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion de representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion que sigue:
					Recientemente, como parte de su brutal politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos intenta imputar a la RPDC las responsabilidades por haber suspendido el descubrimiento de los restos mortales de uniformados norteamericanos que se desarrollaba en el territorio de la RPDC.
					
					El secretario de esa cartera, Chuck Hagel, dijo el 19 de septiembre en la ceremonia por el "dia de prisioneros y desaparecidos en la guerra", que la posicion de ellos es no olvidar nunca a los militares norteamericanos desaparecidos y buscarlos hasta el final para devolverlos a sus familias.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, hablo como si la RPDC fuera la culpable de la no reanudacion del descubrimiento de restos de los uniformados muertos en el territorio de la RPDC y acuso a esta diciendo que "este problema depende del cumplimiento de la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU".
					
					Con anterioridad, el Departamento de Defensa publico una declaracion que imputo tambien las responsabilidades a la RPDC.
					
					Segun ese documento, fueron descubiertos durante casi 10 anos desde 1996 en el Norte de Corea los restos de 229 efectivos norteamericanos y la busqueda fue interrumpida en 2005 debido a la "amenaza a la seguridad" del grupo de descubrimiento. En octubre de 2011, se logro otro acuerdo sobre la reanudacion de ese trabajo, pero este acuerdo fue incumplido debido al lanzamiento de misil balistico, la prueba nuclear y otras "amenazas de provocaciones" de la RPDC en marzo de 2012. Al final, el documento apunta cinicamente que mantendra la presente posicion de suspension hasta cuando el Norte de Corea demuestre la voluntad y acciones de implementar la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU".
					
					En vista del tono con que habla el Departamento de Estado, parece que la busqueda de restos mortales norteamericanos fue iniciada y suspendida por la solicitud de la RPDC.
					
					Desde el principio, ese trabajo comenzo a peticion encarecida y repetida de la administracion norteamericana, la entidad de veteranos de guerra coreana y los familiares de los muertos que deseaban resolver definitivamente el problema de efectivos norteamericanos desaparecidos y muertos en la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					Si se tomaba entonces en consideracion el odio y el revanchismo que abrigaba el pueblo coreano contra los agresores norteamericanos quienes al invadir a la RPDC, impusieron incontables desgracias y penalidades, era inimaginable la devolucion de los restos mortales de abominables agresores.
					
					Dado que llega al climax la confrontacion politica y militar entre RPDC y EE.UU., era inadmisible permitir a los militares del pais enemigo andar en el territorio jurisdiccional de la RPDC. 
					
					Pero, tomando en consideracion con vistas al futuro el ardiente deseo de los familiares de los soldados norteamericanos caidos en la pasada guerra coreana de sepultar sus restos mortales en sus propias tierras natales y que el desenterramiento de restos mortales de efectivos norteamericanos era una labor humanitaria, nuestro ejercito y pueblo tomaron  la magnanima decision de iniciar el trabajo de desenterramiento. 
					
					De esta manera, aun en medio de las incesantes y tenaz maniobras hostiles a la RPDC de EE.UU., se realizo cerca de un decenio desde 1996 sin alguna dificultad el trabajo conjunto de desenterramiento de restos mortales de efectivos norteamericanos gracias a la magnanimidad humanitaria de la RPDC. 
					
					Al respecto, expresaron el profundo agradecimiento los ex presidentes y otras autoridades, los familiares de los difuntos y las entidades sociales de EE.UU. 
					
					Esta obra humanitaria fue suspendida no por la RPDC sino por la actitud gangsteril y unilateral de EE.UU. que cuestiono como "provocacion" el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC. 
					
					Como resultado, los restos mortales de mas de 7 mil 800 uniformados norteamericanos desaparecidos en la pasada guerra coreana vagabundean por el acondicionamiento de la tierra y otras labores para la transformacion de la naturaleza de la RPDC. 
					
					El hecho demuestra que no pasan de ser una mentira e hipocresia las palabras de las autoridades interesadas norteamericanas que  decian que es la firme posicion de EE.UU. buscar hasta el ultimo soldado norteamericano caido en los campos de guerra en ultramar y que la labor humanitaria no tiene nada que ver con la politica. 
					
					Debido a la suspension unilateral causada por la injusta politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC, disolvimos ya hace mucho tiempo el aparato de investigacion y desenterramiento de restos mortales, instituido en la RPDC. 
					
					En la actualidad ruedan por el suelo y desaparecen en montones los restos mortales de uniformados norteamericanos desenterrados por la construccion de centrales hidroelectricas, la transformacion de la naturaleza incluso el acondicionamiento de la tierra, las inundaciones, etc. 
					
					La historia denunciara siglo tras siglo el crimen de lesa humanidad de la administracion estadounidense que practicando la politica hostil a la RPDC, impide brutalmente hasta las labores humanitarias como el desenterramiento de restos mortales de uniformados norteamericanos, acordado por la RPDC y EE.UU.
					
					La administracion de Obama no debe olvidar ni un momento el proverbio: "hasta los restos mortales anoran la tierra natal".

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el Templo Singye del monte Kumgang el acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur de Corea para rezar la reunificacion de la patria con motivo del VII aniversario de la reconstruccion del mismo templo.
					En la ocasion participaron los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, los monjes y los creyentes de varios  templos incluyendo el Singye, por la parte norcoreana, y por la surcoreana, los monjes y creyentes de la Orden Budista Jogye.
					
					 Hubo ceremonia budista e intervenciones y se dio lectura a la oracion conjunta de budistas del Norte y el Sur sobre la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el Templo Singye, reconstruido hace 7 anos con las fuerzas unidas de los budistas de ambas partes coreanas, no cumple todavia su papel de centro religioso por la reunificacion.
					
					Continuaron que los budistas norcoreanos y surcoreanos deben convertirlo cuanto antes en el centro de la union nacional por la reunificacion incorporandose en las acciones practicas para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y abrir el camino de turismo al monte Kumgang.
					
					 La oracion conjunta manifiesta la firme determinacion de los budistas del Norte y el Sur de Corea de eliminar de esta tierra el peligro de guerra y lograr la paz duradera y la reunificacion tomando la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur como la ley de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes realizaron un recorrido turistico sobre la zona de laguna Kuryong.

articles.title: Autores de lanzamiento de volantes son autoridades surcoreanas, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Autores de lanzamiento de volantes son autoridades surcoreanas, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los autores del lanzamiento de volantes en el Sur de Corea son precisamente las autoridades surcoreanas.
					 Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					 Ellas ampararon abiertamente e incitaron activamente la locura de lanzamiento de volantes de las escorias humanas maldiciendo tales como "acto autonomico" y "falta del motivo legal".
					
					  Tal farsa anti-RPDC es la provocacion intolerable contra la aspiracion y demanda de todos los coreanos al mejoramiento de las relaciones N-S y la corriente de la epoca.
					
					 Y deviene la grave hostilidad que agrava cada dia mas la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre ambas partes intercoreanas y causa el choque de las fuerzas armadas y hasta la guerra.
					
					 Tambien constituye el producto de la complicidad de Estados Unidos encaminado a interrumpir la corriente de relajacion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana y las autoridades surcoreanas que obedecen al  imperio.
					
					  La realidad comprueba que mientras no frustre el desafio de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion nacionales y extranjeras que hacen esfuerzos desesperados por danar la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion coreana, no se lograra ni la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben conocer claramente la gravedad de la situacion y actuar con juicio teniendo presente nuestra advertencia de que el porvenir de las relaciones N-S depende enteramente de la actitud de la parte surena.

articles.title: ACNC critica aumento armamentista de EE.UU. para ocupacion perenne de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC critica aumento armamentista de EE.UU. para ocupacion perenne de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos decidio emplazar de manera rotativa dentro de octubre en el Sur de Corea el batallon no. 3 del 8o regimiento blindado estacionado ahora en Texas. 
					Despues de publicada esa decision, la comandancia de fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico anuncio que "EE.UU. seguira manteniendo en el futuro tambien el compromiso de nivel actual para frenar el ataque en la Peninsula Coreana y defenderse de la amenaza proveniente del exterior". 
					
					Esto es una sofisteria para encubrir el objetivo criminal del emplazamiento rotativo y justificarlo. 
					
					Ese movimiento militar resulta una aventura militar para provocar la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y perpetuar la ocupacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Desde hace varios decenios, el imperio viene emplazando por turno a sus tropas agresoras en el Sur de Corea pretextando la amenaza y provocacion de alguien. 
					
					Este ano, introdujo en varias ocasiones al suelo surcoreano el batallon motorizado dotado de tanques "M-1 A-2", carros blindados y otros vehiculos y decenas de aviones de combate como "F-16" y "F-15E". 
					
					Es conocido por todos que ya hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. trazo el plan de agresion de "5 versiones" a fin de apoderarse de toda la Peninsula Coreana, considerada como clave de su estrategia de dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					El plan norteamericano comprende el ataque quirurgico que reproduce la Guerra del Golfo y la guerra total para terminar en un corto plazo la conquista de Corea. 
					
					Tambien incluye la agresion en el caso de "derrumbe interno" de la RPDC, la guerra psicologica y hasta la guerra nuclear que combina el bombardeo preciso con la guerra electronica y la cibernetica. 
					
					EE.UU. cree que para ese fin, es necesario elevar constantemente la capacidad de combate real de sus fuerzas armadas. 
					
					En particular, para el imperio, que sufrio la derrota en la pasada guerra coreana, esa tarea es imprescindible para recuperarse de su derrota. 
					
					En ese contexto, EE.UU. realiza cada ano los ejercicios belicos contra la RPDC introduciendo por turno en el suelo surcoreano sus fuerzas armadas provenientes de diferentes latitudes del mundo. 
					
					Ahora los altos funcionarios del circulo militar norteamericano dicen publicamente que la ubicacion rotativa de sus fuerzas armadas persigue el objetivo de elevar la capacidad de cumplimiento de operaciones en el terreno. 
					
					La realidad evidencia que la verdadera intencion de EE.UU. es elevar la capacidad de adaptacion al terreno y de guerra real de sus unidades militares en el caso de provocar una nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y por fin, perpetuar la ocupacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Para colmo, el emplazamiento rotativo se ha decidido cuando que se crea el ambiente de dialogo en la Peninsula Coreana. Esto revela una vez mas la naturaleza de EE.UU. como perturbador de la paz y estorbador de la reconciliacion y unidad entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					 Es una ilusion vana el intento de EE.UU. de alcanzar su objetivo hegemonico con la introduccion de fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC estan preparadas para aniquilar de un golpe a cualesquier fuerzas agresoras. 
					
					El emplazamiento rotativo agravara la crisis economica de EE.UU. y adelantara su arruinamiento. 
					
					EE.UU. debe evacuar cuanto antes a sus tropas del suelo surcoreano justipreciado la tendencia de la epoca y su situacion incomoda.
